mean_cn: n. 反面；  adj. 倒转的，反转的；  v. 倒转
mean_en: used to describe two things that are related in such a way that as one becomes larger the other becomes smaller
word_etyma: in向内，进入+vers转向+e→把外面转向内的→inverse 反转的
sentence: Good is the inverse of evil just like angels and demons.
sentence_trans: 好的反面是坏，正如天使和魔鬼的对立。
